Package gears.sidescroller.world.entities

Class AbstractEntity

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.core.WorldObject
gears.sidescroller.world.core.MobileWorldObject
gears.sidescroller.world.entities.AbstractEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSerializable, Collidable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player
public abstract class AbstractEntity extends MobileWorldObject
The AbstractEntity is a basic implementation of MobileWorldObject. It represent any more-or-less living being in the game world.

    • setMovingInDir

      public final AbstractEntity setMovingInDir(Direction dir, boolean isMoving)
      Sets whether or not this AbstractEntity is moving of its own accord in the given direction, not accounting for external forces. This is used by key controls.
      Parameters:
      dir - the Direction to set whether or not this is moving in
      isMoving - whether or not this is moving in the given direction
      Returns:
      this, for chaining purposes.

      Parameters:
